title: How are technology and business related? - Quora

response.answer_text: Value generation. Technology is a tool that generates value, and businesses exist to exchange value. So, technology is a tool to allow a business to exchange value more efficaciously or efficiently or to generate novel values that can be exchanged. For example, mobile phones are a technology, businesses sell mobile phones in exchange of money from customers. Here the values that are exchanged are A) All the capabilities of the mobile phone that the customer wants and B) Money
